solution.text:
Area of the shaded region=area of the larger circle - area of the smaller circle
area of the larger circle=\(\pi R^2=\pi \times_{{5*j}}_^2\)
area of the smaller circle=\(\pi r^2=\pi \times_{{4*j}}_^2\)
area of the shaded region=\(\frac {22}7 \times(_{{5*j}}_^2-_{{4*j}}_^2)\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{trunc(pi_val*j*3*j*3,2)}}_\)

content.text:
Two concentric circles of radius R=_{{5*j}}_and r=_{{4*j}}_ are given
Find the area of the shaded region
